comments:
Looks like the image capture ran into a problem trying to keep up with a
cut/paste operation in the source.  I was rearranging the order of elements on a
FillLayout by cutting and pasting the control's construction line. The problem
caused a reload from scratch, and an additional error while exiting the editor.
